spell.name: Feral Flare
entries: A feral roar escapes from your mouth, your foxfire going wild and surging everywhere in an explosion .Each creature in a 30-foot radius sphere centered on the Kitsune must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes {@damage 10d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The user takes a fourth of the total damage of the spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The user can use a spell slot to further reduce the damage. Each levels further halves the damage. if the user have 9 tails the damage of the sphere when casted is of {@dice 20d6}
(even if its counted as a cantrip, you could instead take it as a spell)
